2) The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion King - This is another iconic and beloved fantasy movie of all time! The movie follows the heroic journey of Simba, along with his loyal friends Timon and Pumbaa. They must journey through treacherous landscapes, battle fierce monsters, and overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles in order to complete their quest and defeat the evil One.

I hope you find these two fantasy movies as enjoyable and inspiring as I do!
